short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate a new trks.it link from the page you're viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create trackable links with Google Analytics UTM parameters on the fly with TRKS.IT’s chrome plug-in. You can tag and shorten any link from any web page to seamlessly integrate it into your workflow. Then promote the link and add users who click to remarketing lists. Measure your results right inside Google Analytics. 

Measure the effectiveness of every link using TRKS.IT’s proprietary platform. It’s the only solution on the market that works for ANY link you share and puts the data right inside Google Analytics, even if it’s not a link to your own website. TRKS.IT is patent pending technology.
